zh-cn: 中华人民共和国科学技术协会
en: China Association for Science and Technology

location.zh-cn: 中国北京市海淀区复兴路3号
location.en: 3 Fuxing Road, Haidian District, Beijing, China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国科学技术领域的全国性人民团体，是中国大陆科学技术工作最主要的民间团体之一，由中国共产党中央书记处直接领导。
description.en: A national people's organization in the field of science and technology in the People's Republic of China, one of the most important non-governmental organizations for scientific and technological workers in mainland China, directly led by the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华全国自然科学专门学会联合会

zh-cn: 中华全国自然科学专门学会联合会
en: All-China Federation of Natural Science Societies

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术协会的前身机构之一，于1958年9月与中华全国科学技术普及协会合并组建中国科协。
description.en: One of the predecessor organizations of the China Association for Science and Technology, which merged with the All-China Association for Science and Technology Popularization in September 1958 to form CAST.

nodes.id: 中华全国科学技术普及协会

zh-cn: 中华全国科学技术普及协会
en: All-China Association for Science and Technology Popularization

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术协会的前身机构之一，于1958年9月与中华全国自然科学专门学会联合会合并组建中国科协。
description.en: One of the predecessor organizations of the China Association for Science and Technology, which merged with the All-China Federation of Natural Science Societies in September 1958 to form CAST.

description.zh-cn: 汽车动力学家，中国科学技术协会第九、十届主席。
description.en: An expert in automotive dynamics, serving as the chairman of the 9th and 10th National Committees of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国科学技术协会党组书记、副主席（分管日常工作）、书记处第一书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, currently serving as the Party Group Secretary, Vice Chairman (in charge of daily work), and First Secretary of the Secretariat of the China Association for Science and Technology.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央机构之一，直接领导中国科学技术协会。
description.en: One of the central bodies of the Communist Party of China, which directly leads the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 地质学家、中国科学院院士，曾任中国科学技术协会第一届主席。
description.en: A geologist, academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and the first chairman of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 理论物理学家、中国科学院院士，曾任中国科学技术协会第二届主席。
description.en: A theoretical physicist, academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and the second chairman of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 空气动力学家、中国科学院及中国工程院院士，曾任中国科学技术协会第三届主席。
description.en: An aerodynamicist, academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and Chinese Academy of Engineering, and the third chairman of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 核物理学家、中国科学院及中国工程院院士，曾任中国科学技术协会第四届主席。
description.en: A nuclear physicist, academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and Chinese Academy of Engineering, and the fourth chairman of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 理论物理学家、中国科学院院士，曾任中国科学技术协会第五、六届主席。
description.en: A theoretical physicist, academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and the fifth and sixth chairman of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 医学家、中国科学院院士，曾任中国科学技术协会第七、八届主席。
description.en: A medical scientist, academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and the seventh and eighth chairman of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Formerly served as the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Formerly served as the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Formerly served as the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Formerly served as the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Formerly served as the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Formerly served as the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国科学技术协会党组书记。
description.en: Formerly served as the Party Group Secretary of the China Association for Science and Technology.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国科学技术普及法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国科学技术普及法
en: Law of the People's Republic of China on Popularization of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 一部将普及公众科学知识作为国家战略的法律，法定中国科学技术协会为执行主力。
description.en: A law that establishes the popularization of public scientific knowledge as a national strategy, designating the China Association for Science and Technology as the main implementing body.

nodes.id: 第九届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第九届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the 9th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第九届全国人民代表大会的常设机关，于2002年通过了《中华人民共和国科学技术普及法》。
description.en: The permanent body of the 9th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, which passed the Law on Popularization of Science and Technology in 2002.

nodes.id: 关于全面推开行业协会商会与行政机关脱钩改革的实施意见

zh-cn: 关于全面推开行业协会商会与行政机关脱钩改革的实施意见

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会等部门于2019年发布的政策文件，旨在推动行业协会与行政机关分离。根据该意见，部分原由中国科协主管的协会与其脱钩。
description.en: A policy document issued in 2019 by the National Development and Reform Commission and other departments, aimed at promoting the separation of industry associations from administrative organs. According to this opinion, some associations originally supervised by CAST were decoupled from it.

description.zh-cn: 原由中国科协主管的行业协会，根据脱钩改革于2020年8月与中国科协分离。
description.en: An industry association formerly supervised by CAST, which was separated from CAST in August 2020 according to the decoupling reform.

description.zh-cn: 原由中国科协主管的行业协会，根据脱钩改革于2020年8月与中国科协分离。
description.en: An industry association formerly supervised by CAST, which was separated from CAST in August 2020 according to the decoupling reform.

description.zh-cn: 原由中国科协主管的行业协会，根据脱钩改革于2020年8月与中国科协分离。
description.en: An industry association formerly supervised by CAST, which was separated from CAST in August 2020 according to the decoupling reform.

description.zh-cn: 原由中国科协主管的行业协会，根据脱钩改革于2020年8月与中国科协分离。
description.en: An industry association formerly supervised by CAST, which was separated from CAST in August 2020 according to the decoupling reform.

description.zh-cn: 原由中国科协主管的行业协会，根据脱钩改革于2020年8月与中国科协分离。
description.en: An industry association formerly supervised by CAST, which was separated from CAST in August 2020 according to the decoupling reform.

nodes.id: 中国国际经济技术合作促进会

zh-cn: 中国国际经济技术合作促进会
en: China Association for Promoting International Economic & Technical Cooperation

description.zh-cn: 原由中国科协主管的行业协会，根据脱钩改革于2020年8月与中国科协分离。
description.en: An industry association formerly supervised by CAST, which was separated from CAST in August 2020 according to the decoupling reform.

description.zh-cn: 原由中国科协主管的行业协会，根据脱钩改革于2020年8月与中国科协分离。
description.en: An industry association formerly supervised by CAST, which was separated from CAST in August 2020 according to the decoupling reform.

description.zh-cn: 中国科协主管的全国性学会之一。
description.en: One of the national societies supervised by the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国科协直属事业单位。
description.en: A public institution directly under the China Association for Science and Technology.

en: China Hall of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 中国科协直属事业单位，也是中国科协总部的所在地。
description.en: A public institution directly under the China Association for Science and Technology, and also the location of its headquarters.

en: Beijing Association for Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 中国科协主管的地方科协之一。
description.en: One of the local associations for science and technology supervised by CAST.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的参政党之一。
description.en: One of the political parties in the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华全国自然科学专门学会联合会

description.zh-cn: 与中华全国科学技术普及协会合并组建了中华人民共和国科学技术协会（后更名为中国科学技术协会）。
description.en: Merged with the All-China Association for Science and Technology Popularization to establish the China Association for Science and Technology of the People's Republic of China (later renamed China Association for Science and Technology).

relationships.source: 中华全国科学技术普及协会

description.zh-cn: 与中华全国自然科学专门学会联合会合并组建了中华人民共和国科学技术协会（后更名为中国科学技术协会）。
description.en: Merged with the All-China Federation of Natural Science Societies to establish the China Association for Science and Technology of the People's Republic of China (later renamed China Association for Science and Technology).

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 中国科协是由中共中央书记处直接领导的团体。
description.en: CAST is an organization directly led by the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 担任中国科学技术协会第九、十届主席。
description.en: Serves as the chairman of the 9th and 10th National Committees of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国科协主席万钢是致公党党员。
description.en: Wan Gang, the Chairman of CAST, is a member of the China Zhi Gong Party.

position.zh-cn: 副主席（分管日常工作）、书记处第一书记
position.en: Vice Chairman (in charge of daily work), First Secretary of the Secretariat

description.zh-cn: 担任中国科学技术协会第一届主席。
description.en: Served as the chairman of the 1st National Committee of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 担任中国科学技术协会第二届主席。
description.en: Served as the chairman of the 2nd National Committee of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 担任中国科学技术协会第三届主席。
description.en: Served as the chairman of the 3rd National Committee of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 担任中国科学技术协会第四届主席。
description.en: Served as the chairman of the 4th National Committee of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 担任中国科学技术协会第五、六届主席。
description.en: Served as the chairman of the 5th and 6th National Committees of the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 担任中国科学技术协会第七、八届主席。
description.en: Served as the chairman of the 7th and 8th National Committees of the China Association for Science and Technology.

relationships.source: 第九届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国科学技术普及法

description.zh-cn: 于第二十八次会议通过了《中华人民共和国科学技术普及法》。
description.en: Passed the Law of the People's Republic of China on Popularization of Science and Technology at its 28th session.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国科学技术普及法

description.zh-cn: 该法规定中国科学技术协会是执行科学技术普及工作的主力。
description.en: This law stipulates that the China Association for Science and Technology is the main force for implementing science and technology popularization work.

description.zh-cn: 根据2019年《关于全面推开行业协会商会与行政机关脱钩改革的实施意见》，于2020年8月与中国科协分离，不再是其主管的社会团体。
description.en: According to the 2019 'Implementation Opinions on Comprehensively Promoting the Decoupling Reform of Industry Associations and Chambers of Commerce from Administrative Organs', it separated from CAST in August 2020 and is no longer a social organization under its supervision.

description.zh-cn: 中国科协主管的全国性学会。
description.en: A national society supervised by the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国科协的直属事业单位。
description.en: A public institution directly under the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国科协的直属事业单位。
description.en: A public institution directly under the China Association for Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国科协主管的地方科协。
description.en: A local association for science and technology supervised by the China Association for Science and Technology.
